Action.author: vladimirwork
Action.body: ~lbendixsen FYI: It is possible to upgrade the pool to *not* the latest version in the repo using pool-upgrade command (e.g. you can upgrade 1.6.80 pool to 1.6.82 right now despite that 1.6.83 is the latest).

Action.author: mgbailey
Action.body: This is contrary to what we have been instructed in the past. ~kelly.wilson can you please comment?

Action.author: ashcherbakov
Action.body: It may be not the case initially, but fixed later.

Action.author: lbendixsen
Action.body: Thanks Alexander and Vladimir for clarifying comments and verification of current behavior. This ticket can be closed as invalid.
